sign-up-form.name-description: The names should be written in cyrillic.
sign-up-form.nickname-description: This nickname will be used in tournaments, the Discord server and various other places.
sign-up-form.university-proof-images-description: The proof can be a picture of your student book, a picture from a university platform or a certificate confirming that you are a student.
sign-up-form.too-short: The field should contain at least {length} symbols.
sign-up-form.too-long: The field should contain at most {length} symbols.
sign-up-form.regex-error: The field does not match the requirements.

welcome-step.title: Welcome to FMI{Codes}!
welcome-step.description: We are glad to have you here! Let's complete your profile and get you started.
welcome-step.try-again: Please, try again. If the problem persists, contact us.

avatar-step.title: Avatar Selection
avatar-step.description: Choose your avatar and customize it to your liking.

discord-step.title: Discord Account
discord-step.description: Connect your Discord account to FMI{Codes} in order to join or Discord server.

completed-step.title: We're all set!
completed-step.description: You are now ready to start your journey in FMI'{Codes'} 2024. Let's go!
completed-step.try-again: Please, try again. If the problem persists, contact us.

create-team-dialog.name: Name
create-team-dialog.too-short: The field should contain at least {length} symbols.
create-team-dialog.too-long: The field should contain at most {length} symbols.

invite-confirmation-dialog.title: Invite Confirmation
invite-confirmation-dialog.description: Are you sure you want to invite {name} to join your team?

leave-team-dialog.title: Leave team
leave-team-dialog.description: Are you sure you want to leave the team?

team-member-avatar.try-again: Please, try again. If the problem persists, contact us.

invite-item.you-have-been-invited: You have been invited to join the team {teamName}.
invite-item.accepted: The invite has been accepted successfully.
invite-item.declined: The invite has been declined successfully.
invite-item.try-again: Please, try again. If the problem persists, contact us.
